blur_detection.description: The receipt exhibits good sharpness with most text clearly legible despite some very minor softness.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action required as text is sufficiently sharp for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt shows good black text on white paper contrast with clear differentiation between elements.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No adjustment needed as contrast is sufficient for accurate data extraction.

glare_identification.description: No significant glare or reflections that would obstruct text readability are present on the receipt.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action required as the lighting conditions during capture were appropriate.

water_stains.description: No visible water damage, staining or discoloration is present on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: No action required as the document is free from water damage.

tears_or_folds.description: The receipt shows visible creases and wrinkles across the paper that create some minor text distortion.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: Consider using a document flattening technique prior to scanning to reduce creasing effects.

cut_off_detection.description: All edges of the receipt are visible with no content appearing to be cut off from the frame.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: No action required as the full receipt is captured within the image frame.

missing_sections.description: The receipt appears complete with all standard sections visible including header, line items, and payment details.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action required as all expected receipt sections are present.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows or other obstructions are visible that would block content on the receipt.
obstructions.recommendation: No action required as the image is free from obstructions.
